Articles.Content:
Alright, so today, i was flying around Kerbin until I reached a speed of 456 M/S, Faster than the speed of sound in KSP. It was faster than Mach 1, but was not as fast than Mach 1.5. The kerbal engineers seemed VERY freaked out at this, because the plane was flying at low altitude. Because KSP's speed of sound is estimated to be around 350-300 M/S, The approximate speed I reached was Mach 1.3 (I'm a math genius).

So rather than achieving 456 M/S, I achieved MACH 1.3!

:sticktongue::sticktongue:

Make yourself useful and grab me a soda -Various Sources.
